tips.title: Battle Basics
tips.content: Use ATTACK for basic damage, SKILLS for special moves (costs SP), GUARD to reduce damage, and ITEM to use consumables. Watch your HP!

tips.title: Low HP
tips.content: Your HP is low! Use healing items or guard to survive.

tips.title: Low SP
tips.content: Your SP is running low! Basic attacks don't cost SP.

tips.title: Status Effects
tips.content: Poison, burn, and other effects can drain HP or weaken you. Use items or skills to cleanse them.

tips.title: Shopping
tips.content: Use UP/DOWN to browse items, ENTER to buy/sell. Press ESC to exit. Shops may have limited stock and different hours!

tips.title: Shop Hours
tips.content: Some shops close at night. Check back during the day or rest at an inn to advance time.

tips.title: Fishing Available
tips.content: You found a fishing spot! Press ENTER to cast your line. Watch for the bobber to dip, then press SPACE quickly to hook the fish. Use UP/DOWN to reel it in!

tips.title: First Catch
tips.content: Nice catch! Fish can be sold or used in recipes. Try different spots for rare fish.

tips.title: Legendary Catch
tips.content: A legendary fish! These rare catches are worth a fortune or have special uses.

tips.title: Inventory
tips.content: Press I to open inventory, ENTER to use items, and D to drop items. Consumables can heal or cure status effects.

tips.title: Quest Log
tips.content: Quests track objectives and rewards. Open the Quest Log from the pause menu to see active tasks and where to go next.

tips.title: Level Up
tips.content: Level ups boost your stats and can grant new skills. Check your skill tree and gear to stay ahead of tougher fights.

tips.title: Party Members
tips.content: Party members bring unique skills and can be managed from the Party menu.

tips.title: Equipment
tips.content: Equip weapons and armor to boost stats. Compare items before equipping to keep your build balanced.

tips.title: New Skill Unlocked
tips.content: Unlocked skills can be equipped and used in battle. Check your skill tree for more options!

tips.title: Crafting Unlocked
tips.content: Crafting combines materials into useful items. Discover recipes through quests and exploration.

tips.title: Saving
tips.content: Save at save points or from the pause menu. Saving frequently protects progress before tough encounters.

tips.title: After Defeat
tips.content: If you fall in battle you'll reload your last save. Keep healing items handy and save often.

tips.title: Nightfall
tips.content: Nighttime brings tougher enemies and closed shops. Rest at inns or prepare supplies before exploring late.

tips.title: Welcome to Town
tips.content: Towns have shops, inns, and NPCs with quests. Explore and talk to everyone!

tips.title: Entering a Dungeon
tips.content: Dungeons contain tougher enemies and valuable loot. Save before entering!

tips.title: Gambling
tips.content: Gambling can win you gold, but be careful! Set limits and know when to walk away. Some games have better odds than others.

tips.title: Winning a Bet
tips.content: Winner! Know when to walk away - the house always has an edge.

tips.title: Loss at the Tables
tips.content: Tough luck! Set a budget and stick to it. There's always next time.

tips.title: Monster Arena
tips.content: Study fighter stats and records before betting. Odds reflect win rates - underdogs pay more but win less often!

tips.title: Arena Betting
tips.content: Bet placed! Watch the fight and collect your winnings if your pick wins.

tips.title: Dungeon Puzzle
tips.content: Push blocks onto pressure plates to open doors. If you get stuck, look for a reset switch near the entrance.

tips.title: Puzzle Solved
tips.content: Puzzle solved! Dungeons often have multiple puzzles blocking the way to treasure.

tips.title: Brain Teaser
tips.content: Brain teasers test your wits! Take your time and think carefully.

tips.title: Post-Game Content
tips.content: Congratulations on completing the story! All level restrictions are removed. Seek out secret bosses, complete challenge dungeons, and aim for 100% completion!

tips.title: Almost There!
tips.content: You're close to 100% completion! Check the Completion menu in Pause to see what's left.

help_entries.title: Movement
help_entries.content:
Arrow Keys: Move
ENTER/SPACE: Interact
ESC: Menu/Back
I: Inventory
M: Map

help_entries.title: Battle Controls
help_entries.content:
UP/DOWN: Navigate menu
ENTER: Confirm action
ESC: Cancel
1-4: Quick select action

help_entries.title: Inventory Controls
help_entries.content:
I: Open inventory
ENTER: Use/Equip
D: Drop item
TAB: Sort items

help_entries.title: Shop Controls
help_entries.content:
UP/DOWN: Select item
LEFT/RIGHT: Change quantity
ENTER: Buy/Sell
ESC: Exit shop

help_entries.title: Battle Tips
help_entries.content: Exploit weaknesses with skills, guard when low on HP, and use items to remove status effects.

help_entries.title: Quests
help_entries.content: Track active quests from the pause menu. Some quests unlock new shops or party members when completed.

help_entries.title: Crafting
help_entries.content: Crafting stations let you combine materials into gear or consumables. Recipes unlock from quests or discoveries.

help_entries.title: Fishing Guide
help_entries.content: Find fishing spots near water (sparkles). Cast with ENTER, watch for bobber dip, press SPACE to hook. Reel in with UP, manage tension with timing. Premium spots have rarer fish!

help_entries.title: Puzzle Guide
help_entries.content: Push blocks with movement keys. Step on plates to trigger switches. Light torches with torch item. Look for reset switches if stuck.

help_entries.title: Gambling Guide
help_entries.content: Blackjack: Get close to 21 without going over. Dice: Guess high (8+) or low (6-). Slots: Match symbols for payouts. Cups: Track the ball through shuffles.

help_entries.title: Arena Guide
help_entries.content: Watch monster battles and bet on outcomes. Study fighter stats and odds. Lower odds = favorite, higher odds = underdog. Odds update based on win rates.
